values.title: Bridging the funding gap
values.body: Globally, total aid budgets fall USD2.5 trillion short of the funds needed to achieve the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).

values.title: Doing business
values.body: The ‘Impact Investing’ market, private funds for social impact businesses, is growing, but the Indo-Pacific share in these investments is just 6%.

values.title: Delivering impact
values.body: Our program is strengthening the ecosystem around social enterprise and impact investment to help realise potential in the Asia-Pacific.
